events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because I no longer want the product.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request due to the customer's mention of a refund and wrong item receipt.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah J for handling the refund request regarding the incorrect item delivered.
Hello, I am Sarah, and I am here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo showing that I received a completely different product.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund which will be processed back to your original payment method within 5 business days.
I appreciate the prompt response and am happy to hear the refund will be processed quickly. Thank you for your help.
The refund request has been resolved. A confirmation email with details has been sent to the customer.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
Since no further issues were reported, the case has now been formally closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on your recent experience with our refund process.
